thread.title: BRIEF-Model N Announces First Quarter Of Fiscal Year 2018 Financial Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Model N Announces First Quarter Of Fiscal Year 2018 Financial Results
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Model N Inc:
* MODEL N ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 * Q1 REVENUE $39.1 MILLION * SEES Q2 TOTAL GAAP REVENUES $38.0 MILLION - $38.5 MILLION
* SEES 2018 TOTAL GAAP REVENUES $149.0 MILLION - $151.0 MILLION
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.05 - $0.03 * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 â€“ $0.03 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $37.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $36.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16, REVENUE VIEW $149.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
